languages.text: "Весь корабль слышал, как вы милуетесь с госпожой Хейдари, Лорд-капитан. В подробностях — охи, ахи, стоны и прочая неуставная рутина".
"The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."
languages.original_text: "Весь корабль слышал, как вы милуетесь с госпожой Хейдари, Лорд-капитан. В подробностях — охи, ахи, стоны и прочая неуставная рутина".

traits.locale_text: "The entire ship heard you making out with Mistress Heydari, Lord Captain. I mean the grunts, the moans, the gasps and the other non-statutory activities."
"The entire ship heard you making out with Mistress Heydari, Lord Captain. I mean the grunts, the moans, the gasps and the other non-statutory activities."
"The entire ship heard you getting it on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Captain. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-statutory activities."
"The entire ship heard you getting it on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Captain. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-statutory activities."
"The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."
"The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

languages.text: « Tout le vaisseau vous a {mf|entendu|entendue} vous ébattre avec maîtresse Heydari, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Rien ne nous a été épargné : grognements, gémissements, halètements et tout ce qui s'ensuit. »
languages.original_text: "The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

traits.locale_text: « Tout le vaisseau vous a {mf|entendu|entendue} vous ébattre avec maîtresse Heydari, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Rien ne nous a été épargné : grognements, gémissements, halètements et tout ce qui s'ensuit. »

languages.text: “整艘船的船员都听到了您和海达利女士的暧昧过程，舰长大人。所有的细节都事无巨细地传到了我们耳中，无论是呻吟声、喘息声，还是其他不可言说的活动内容。”
languages.original_text: "The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

traits.locale_text: “整艘船的船员都听到了您和海达利女士的暧昧过程，舰长大人。我们没有听漏任何细节，无论是哼声、呻吟、喘息，还是其他所有不可言说的活动内容。”

languages.text: "Das ganze Schiff hat gehört, wie Ihr mit Herrin Heydari rumgemacht habt, Lord Cap'n. Uns wurden keine Details erspart — das Grunzen, das Stöhnen, das Keuchen und all die anderen nicht vorschriftsmäßigen Aktivitäten."
languages.original_text: "The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

traits.locale_text: "Das ganze Schiff hat gehört, wie Ihr mit Herrin Heydari rumgemacht habt, Lord Captain. Uns wurden keine Details erspart — das Grunzen, das Stöhnen, das Keuchen und all die anderen nicht vorschriftsmäßigen Aktivitäten."

languages.text: «Toda la tripulación ha escuchado lo bien que se lo ha pasado con la señora Heydari, Lord Capitán. No nos hemos perdido ni un solo detalle: los gruñidos, los gemidos, los jadeos, y demás actos no reglamentarios».
languages.original_text: "The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

traits.locale_text: «Toda la tripulación ha escuchado lo bien que se lo ha pasado con la señora Heydari, Lord Capitán. No nos hemos perdido ni un solo detalle: los gruñidos, los gemidos, los jadeos, y demás actos no permitidos».

languages.text: 「全船員が、ヘイダリ女史との行為を聞いたのですよ、ロード・キャプテン。その細部すらすべても…うめき声、喘ぎ声、吐息、そして…その他すべての規制外な行為も」
languages.original_text: "The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

traits.locale_text: 「全船員が、ヘイダリ女史との行為を聞いたのですよ、ロード・キャプテン。その細部すらすべても…うめき声、喘ぎ声、吐息、そして…その他すべての規制外な行為も」

languages.text: "Tüm gemi Heydari Hanım'la oynaşmalarınızı duydu Lord Kaptan. Hiçbir detay bizden esirgenmedi: Tüm hırıltılar, inlemeler, solumalar ve yönetmelik dışı diğer aktiviteler."
languages.original_text: "The entire ship heard you carrying on with Mistress Heydari, Lord Cap'n. We weren't spared any details — the grunts, the moans, the gasps, and all the other non-regulation activities."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm gemi Heydari Hanım'la oynaştığınızı duydu Lord Kaptan. Hiçbir detay bizden esirgenmedi: Tüm hırıltılar, inlemeler, solumalar ve yönetmelik dışı tüm diğer aktiviteler."
